articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City boss says Jurgen Klopp's teams have made him a better manager - Sky Sports
articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola believes his rivalry with Jurgen Klopp has made him a better manager while Klopp believes City remain the best team in Europe.

articles.title: Europe's BepiColombo mission bears down on Mercury - BBC News
articles.description: The space probe arrives at its destination in the coming hours but will immediately swing away.
articles.content:
